name: Artificial Rain
description:
left click: 
STATE label, to enable and disable audio engine. 
MODE label, to switch channel between mono and stereo.

knob control: 
RUMBLE, the volume of rumble sound. 
DRIP, the volume of drip sound. 
DROP, the volume of drop sound. 
AMBIENCE, the volume of ambience sound. 
BANDWIDTH, the amount of input feed into lowpass filter. 
IN_DIFF, the amount of diffusion in pre-tank. 
DECAY_DIFF, the amount of diffusion in reverb tank. 
DAMPING, the amount of absorption in reverb tank. 
DECAY, the amount of feedback in reverb tank. 
RATE, the amount of modulation rate in reverb tank. 
DEPTH, the amount of modulation depth in reverb tank. 
MIX, the portion of dry and wet.

The design of real-time algorithms is part of the work, which included cross modulation, biqaud filter, state variable filter, wavetable oscillator, white gaussian noise…
